name: querist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who asks a question, especially about religion or morals: It became necessary for the querist to explain what was different about now. I use the word "querist" occasionally here in reference to commentators on the "social question" from that time.
More examplesFewer examplesWe recommend your querist to ask his question to those who claim special authority.In answer to my querist, it is no real problem for me to accept those who use instrumental music in church, even though I am opposed to it.
